Package project.game

Class Entities<T extends Entity>

java.lang.Object
project.game.Entities<T>
public class Entities<T extends Entity> extends Object
Stores a list of entities, along with a quadtree, if specified.

      cons - the runnable

    • query

      public void query(float x, float y, float r, gameutils.func.Cons<T> cons)
      Runs the specified runnable for every possible entity in the circle defined with center at (x, y) and radius r.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      r - the radius
      cons - the runnable

    • raycast

      public void raycast(float x, float y, float r, float ang, float len, gameutils.func.Cons2<T,gameutils.math.Vec2> cons)
      Runs the specified runnable for every possible entity in the ray starting at (x, y), with width r, angle ang, and length len.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the origin
      y - the y coordinate of the origin
      r - the width of the ray casted
      ang - the angle of the ray casted
      len - the length of the ray casted
      cons - the runnable that's run; has two parameters, entity and position.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates every valid entity in this list.
